character.age: 220 years, though appears to be in her mid-twenties due to Drow aging process.
character.background: Born in the underdark city of Menzoberranzan, Eira was trained from a young age in the art of stealth and assassination by her mother. She left her city to explore the surface world and rid it of corruption.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown, often tied in a ponytail
